name: traditions
description: Base game traditions (policies) available across all ages

values.name: Ahupua'a
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings.

values.name: Akhet
values.description: +2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts on Navigable Rivers.

values.name: Ambassadors
values.description: +6[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per turn.

values.name: Angadi
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in Settlements other than your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital if they have a [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Water Building.

values.name: Angarium
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town.

values.name: Arthashastra
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for every 5 surplus [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Assembly Line
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

values.name: Atassa
values.description: +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Ranged Units when defending.

values.name: Auxilia
values.description: +3% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Military Units in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital for every [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Town.

values.name: Avant Garde
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on displayed [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Works.

values.name: Baghatur
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Cavalry Units.

values.name: Banner Army
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units against Land Units.

values.name: Baojia
values.description: +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for each [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to a [icon:YIELD_CITIES] City. This becomes +2 in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities other than your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital.

values.name: Bataillon-Carré
values.description: Infantry Units gain the Swift ability, allowing them to ignore Zone of Control.

values.name: Bayeux Tapestry
values.description: +4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in Settlements not founded by you.

values.name: Beopseong
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with a [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Building.

values.name: Black Flag
values.description: +100% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold from [icon:Action_Pillage] Plundering Trade Routes.

values.name: Bourgeoisie
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities in your Homelands.

values.name: Bread Dance
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Farming Towns and +4 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Fishing Towns.

values.name: Cấm Binh
values.description: +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortifications in Settlements with at least 1 Garrisoned Unit.

values.name: Castes
values.description: +2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in all Settlements.

values.name: Cerro Rico
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources, or +3 in Distant Lands.

values.name: Charismatic Leader
values.description: +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on the Palace.

values.name: Charters
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Buildings.

values.name: Charvaka
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings.

values.name: Chivalry
values.description: +30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Cavalry Units.

values.name: Chuang Guandong
values.description: +25% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with a [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.

values.name: City Guard
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

values.name: City of Peace
values.description: All [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings receive a +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency with the City Hall and Palace.

values.name: Civil Engineering
values.description: +30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Overbuilding.

values.name: Clan Networks
values.description: +20% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns with a [icon:PROJECT_GROWTH] Growing Focus.

values.name: Clan Society
values.description: +3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements for each other friendly Settlement within 6 tiles.

values.name: Cocorico
values.description: When you defeat an enemy Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of its [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength.

values.name: Cohong
values.description: +50% [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Income.

values.name: Coinage
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each imported [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource.

values.name: Coking
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities for every [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.

values.name: Collectivization
values.description: [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_EXPANSIONIST] Expansionist Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Colonial Surplus
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Adjacency for [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Buildings.

values.name: Commissioned Officers
values.description: +30% Commander Experience. +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Fleets and Armies.

values.name: Commodities
values.description: +1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Commune
values.description: +20% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Overbuilding. +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

values.name: Compendious Book
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

values.name: Conquista
values.description: +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units in Distant Lands.

values.name: Conscription
values.description: -1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Units.

values.name: Constitution
values.description: +25% [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards maintaining [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.

values.name: Con Kênh
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Buildings and +2 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings.

values.name: Corridos
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted into the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.

values.name: Cry of Dolores
values.description: +1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Land and Naval Units in friendly territory for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted into the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.

values.name: Cultural Imperialism
values.description: +6 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.

values.name: Cursus Honorum
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Diplomacy and [icon:MILITARY] Military Buildings, doubled if a Building is both.

values.name: Defense of the Motherland
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Land Units in your own territory.

values.name: Delian League
values.description: +30% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors.

values.name: Demagogy
values.description: Gain [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on the Palace equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_CULTURAL] Cultural Attribute.

values.name: Devakoshta
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Buildings.

values.name: De Facto
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units in Distant Lands. Units gain +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing.

values.name: De Jure
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units in Homelands.

values.name: Dirigisme
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

values.name: Divine Engine Division
values.description: +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in Settlements with a garrisoned Unit.

values.name: Divine Right
values.description: +10[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and +4[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence on the Palace.

values.name: Draft
values.description: +25%[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing Units and -1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold maintenance for Units.

values.name: Drama and Poetry
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings. +20% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings.

values.name: Drekahöfuð
values.description: Training a Naval Unit grants [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of the Unit's base [icon:YIELD_Production] Production cost.

values.name: Drills
values.description: +30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Infantry and Ranged Units.

values.name: Dróttkvætt
values.description: [icon:Action_Pillage] Coastal Raiding grants [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 50% the [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold gained.

values.name: Dūrāni
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortification Buildings.

values.name: East India Company
values.description: +5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

values.name: Emancipation Reform
values.description: +15% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production but -15% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Enlightenment
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Adjacency for [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings.

values.name: Erkân-ı Harbiye Mektebi
values.description: Land Military Units fight as though they were at full [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength even when damaged.

values.name: Ethics
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.

values.name: Evangelism
values.description: +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Civilian Units. +1 charge for [icon:UNIT_MISSIONARY] Missionaries.

values.name: False Retreat
values.description: [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging Improvements grants [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in all [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns equal to 50% of the yield or [icon:Action_Heal] HP gained. -3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Military Units against [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

values.name: Familia Regis
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted into the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.

values.name: Farmland Assessment
values.description: +5%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Land Units.

values.name: Fireside Chats
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

values.name: Free Press
values.description: [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_CULTURAL] Cultural Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Free Speech
values.description: +50% [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards maintaining [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.

values.name: Fukoku Kyōhei
values.description: When you train an Aircraft or Naval Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science equal to 25% of its [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost.

values.name: Gaulos
values.description: +25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings on Coast or Navigable Rivers.

values.name: General Moroz
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units in Tundra.

values.name: Gerege
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements not founded by you for each [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.

values.name: Gift Economy
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for every imported [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource.

values.name: Girru
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production and [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in Settlements not founded by you.

values.name: Gold Rush
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources.

values.name: Grand Secretariat
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Buildings and +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science buildings.

values.name: Great and Most Fortunate Navy
values.description: +50% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Naval Units. -1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Naval Units.

values.name: Guanxi
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence on [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings.

values.name: Gunpowder Empire
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units.

values.name: Haab'
values.description: +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Buildings.

values.name: Helikhilenawewipe
values.description: +50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards the initiating and progressing the [icon:PROJECT] Befriend Independent Project.

values.name: Heqin
values.description: +5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance.

values.name: Himāl
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tiles in your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital, +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountain tiles in other Settlements.

values.name: Honor
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against [icon:INDEPENDENT_POWER] Independent Powers.

values.name: Hospitality
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for every [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.

values.name: Ho'okupu
values.description: +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Marine Terrain.

values.name: Humanism
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists, but +50% Specialist [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Maintenance.

values.name: Iconolatry
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold from [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Works.

values.name: Indenture
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Adjacency for [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Buildings.

values.name: Interlacustrine
values.description: All [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings gain Adjacency from Lakes.

values.name: Iron Cross
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units within the [icon:COMMANDER_RADIUS] Command Radius of a [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commander with a Commendation.

values.name: Isa
values.description: +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength and +2 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for all Units on Navigable Rivers.

values.name: Jarlig
values.description: +25% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities not founded by you.

values.name: Jins-i Kamil
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Farms for each adjacent Plantation, and on Plantations for each adjacent Farm.

values.name: Jiu Qing
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence on [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Buildings.

values.name: Juré
values.description: +4[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture from the Palace and +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness from City Halls.

values.name: Kakawfe Pafkotaweta
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every time a Storm, Flood, or Volcanic Eruption has provided Fertility this Age. [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements, [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings, and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts do not get damaged by Storms.

values.name: Kambu-Mera
values.description: +100% [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards maintaining [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.

values.name: Kapa
values.description: +50% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings.

values.name: Kara
values.description: +50%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Infantry Units.

values.name: Kemet
values.description: +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements and [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts on Navigable Rivers.

values.name: Kōkūtai
values.description: +6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Aircraft attacking an enemy Naval Unit adjacent to a friendly Naval Unit.

values.name: Kshatriya
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:MILITARY] Military Buildings.

values.name: Laissez-Faire
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for every imported [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource.

values.name: Land Heritage
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountains. +6[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_NATURAL_WONDER] Natural Wonders.

values.name: Latinitas
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food, [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold, and [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns, or +2 in [icon:PROJECT_TOWN_FORT] Fort Towns.

values.name: La Reforma
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted into the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.

values.name: Lend-Lease
values.description: +5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every active [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route.

values.name: Levies
values.description: +25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing Military Units. -1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Units.

values.name: Literature
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings. +20% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science Buildings.

values.name: Living Standards
values.description: +25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness towards maintaining [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings.

values.name: Lyfsteinn
values.description: +10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing for Naval Units outside friendly territory.

values.name: Maitri Sanadhi
values.description: +50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating [icon:ENDEAVOR] Endeavors if you have the least amount of Settlements, +20% otherwise.

values.name: Marakkalam
values.description: -2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Naval Units.

values.name: Maritime Law
values.description: +30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Naval Units.

values.name: Martial Law
values.description: [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_MILITARISTIC] Militaristic Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Materiel
values.description: +10 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing for Units. +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement for Armies and Fleets.

values.name: Mayūrāsana
values.description: +25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing anything.

values.name: May This Please The People
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources on or adjacent to Coast.

values.name: Mediatization
values.description: +10%[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities not founded by you.

values.name: Medicine
values.description: Units gain +5 [icon:Action_Heal] Healing.

values.name: Merry Life and a Short One
values.description: When you defeat a Support Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to the Unit’s [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost. When you defeat a Naval Unit, gain [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to 25% of the Unit’s [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost.

values.name: Metropole
values.description: +1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in all [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities in Homelands. +10 Range for all [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes.

values.name: Miḫiṣtu
values.description: +25% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings and [icon:WONDER] Wonders with a [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Work slot.

values.name: Military-Industrial Complex
values.description: +50% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training all Military Units, but +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for all Units.

values.name: Miracles of the Twins
values.description: All Units gain the Poison ability, +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength against [icon:DAMAGED] Wounded Units.

values.name: Monopolies
values.description: +5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +1 [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource Capacity in Settlements with a Factory.

values.name: Mud Brick
values.description: +50% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Buildings. +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Buildings in Settlements on Plains or Desert.

values.name: Mueang
values.description: +5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for each [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.

values.name: Naukograd
values.description: [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_SCIENTIFIC] Scientific Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Negarakertagama
values.description: +33% [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food towards maintaining [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.

values.name: New Deal
values.description: +30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:WONDER] Wonders.

values.name: Ngatu
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse Buildings.

values.name: Ng'oma
values.description: +6 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units when adjacent to a Lake.

values.name: No Eternal Allies
values.description: +10% [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns, but -5% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital for every [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance.

values.name: Oratory
values.description: +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence per turn.

values.name: Order and Progress
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities for every [icon:TRADITION] Tradition slotted into the [icon:GOVERNMENT] Government.

values.name: Osmanlı Barok
values.description: +3[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness from displayed Great Works.

values.name: O-yatoi Gaikokujin
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.

values.name: Palisading
values.description: +50% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortification Buildings.

values.name: Panji
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists not in your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital.

values.name: Patronage
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Adjacency for [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Buildings.

values.name: Peloponnesian League
values.description: +30% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating [icon:SANCTIONS] Sanctions.

values.name: People's Army
values.description: +25%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Land Military Units, but +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Land Military Units.

values.name: Pet Kot
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Vegetated Terrain in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Pithi Chrat
values.description: +4 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units on Floodplains.

values.name: Police State
values.description: +8 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities while at [icon:WAR] War.

values.name: Port of Nations
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every active [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route.

values.name: Prathetsarat
values.description: +20% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating [icon:DIPLOMATIC_ACTION] Diplomatic Actions with [icon:CITYSTATE] City-States.

values.name: Preservation Societies
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science from displayed [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Works.

values.name: Press Gangs
values.description: +50%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards Naval Units for every [icon:UNIT_FLEET_COMMANDER] Fleet Commander you have.

values.name: Priesthood
values.description: +2[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in all Settlements.

values.name: Princeps Civitatis
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:CITY_URBAN] Districts in your [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital.

values.name: Proceedings
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with both a [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Work and a [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource slotted.

values.name: Productive Forces Determinism
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

values.name: Projection of Force
values.description: +50%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Naval Units, but +1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Naval Units.

values.name: Proletariat
values.description: +4 [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

values.name: Propaganda
values.description: [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_ECONOMIC] Economic Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Public Works
values.description: +30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards completing [icon:DEFAULT_PROJECT] Projects.

values.name: Qilachas
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified Districts.

values.name: Qullqa
values.description: Receive +25% of the [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold from [icon:TRADE_INCOME] Trade Income as [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food.

values.name: Quinquereme
values.description: +25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing Naval Units. -1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Naval Units.

values.name: Quipu
values.description: Settlements gain +0.5 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every Urban [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population and +0.5 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production for every Rural [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population.

values.name: Qullarāqāsi
values.description: +15 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in Settlements for every [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Commander stationed on a [icon:CITY_URBAN] District there.

values.name: Rationalism
values.description: +15% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science in your own [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities that are converted to your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.

values.name: Realpolitik
values.description: +10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in all [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities while at [icon:WAR] War.

values.name: Regulars
values.description: +30%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Infantry and Ranged Units.

values.name: Reiði Guðanna
values.description: All [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings gain a +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Cultural and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production Adjacency from Volcanoes and [icon:NOTIFICATION_DISCOVER_NATURAL_WONDER] Natural Wonders. (Natural Wonder Volcanoes do not count twice) +25% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold towards purchasing [icon:ACTION_IMPROVE] Repairs.

values.name: Religious Orders
values.description: +15% [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in your own [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities that are converted to your [icon:NAR_REW_RELIGION] Religion.

values.name: Renaissance
values.description: +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:WONDER] Wonders. +2 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on displayed [icon:NAR_REW_GREATWORK] Great Works.

values.name: Riches of the Duat
values.description: +10% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:WONDER] Wonders, doubled when constructed in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities in [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Desert Terrain. +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:WONDER] Wonders on Desert.

values.name: Rites and Rituals
values.description: +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in all Settlements.

values.name: Robber Baron
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence in Cities for every [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to them.

values.name: Reign of Terror
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters, but -25% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Ruộng Làng Xã
values.description: +10% [icon:GROWTH_RATE] Growth Rate in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

values.name: Sakdina
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities for each [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.

values.name: Sales and Trade
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for each [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource assigned to [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with at least 5 [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.

values.name: Scholars
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.

values.name: Scorched Earth
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units when attacking. +25% yields and HP from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging.

values.name: Sedef Kakma
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters with at least 1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Building. +3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on [icon:CITY_UNIQUE_QUARTER] Quarters with at least 1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture Building.

values.name: Seorabeol
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and +1 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources assigned to Trade Outpost or Factory Towns.

values.name: Servitium Debitum
values.description: -2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Maintenance for Cavalry Units.

values.name: Shahanshah
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Units in enemy territory.

values.name: Shell-Tempered Pottery
values.description: [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food, [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold, and [icon:YIELD_WAREHOUSE] Warehouse [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings receive a +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Adjacency for [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources. Can apply multiple times per [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building.

values.name: Shreni
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every 5 surplus [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Shusei Kokubō
values.description: [icon:MILITARY] Military Buildings gain Adjacency from Coast.

values.name: Siege Train
values.description: When a unit destroys a [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Fortified District's defenses, all other Land Siege and Infantry Units have their [icon:Action_Move] Movement restored.

values.name: Social Science
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists, but +50% Specialist [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food Maintenance.

values.name: Soleymaniyeh Palace
values.description: +0.5 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence for every [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Population in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital.

values.name: Sphere of Influence
values.description: Gain [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_POLITICAL] Diplomatic Attribute for every [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Alliance you have.

values.name: State Railway
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence from [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Buildings.

values.name: Stratagems
values.description: +50% yields and [icon:Action_Heal] HP from [icon:Action_Pillage] Pillaging.

values.name: Strategic Allies
values.description: All [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Routes between you and your [icon:PLAYER_RELATIONSHIP_ALLIANCE] Allies grant [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food and [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production equal to the route's [icon:TRADE_INCOME] Trade Income.

values.name: Strategic Railways
values.description: +20% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Buildings and [icon:CITY_RURAL] Improvements in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities with a Rail Station.

values.name: Strategoi
values.description: +25% [icon:UNIT_ARMY_COMMANDER] Army Commander experience.

values.name: Style Empire
values.description: Constructing a [icon:CITY_BUILDING_LIST] Building grants [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture equal to 25% of its [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production cost.

values.name: Subak
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Marine Terrain in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Suffetes
values.description: +20% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in Mining [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns. +20% [icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in Fishing or Farming [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

values.name: Suffrage
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists. -3 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns.

values.name: Survey
values.description: Scouts gain +1 [icon:Action_Move] Movement and [icon:Action_Showall] Sight.

values.name: Takesiyake Yepepoki
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Tundra, Desert, and Plains Terrain in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Takuaka
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Fishing Boats in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities. +2 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Fishing Boats on Reefs in all Settlements.

values.name: Tariffs
values.description: +50% [icon:TRADE_INCOME] Trade Income, but -3 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Their Finest Hour
values.description: +25% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Air Units. +5 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Air Units in your own territory.

values.name: The Golden Road
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science for each imported [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource.

values.name: Throne Of My Fathers
values.description: +15% [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities adjacent to Coast.

values.name: Tianxia
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.

values.name: Timbuktu
values.description: +2 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Mines on [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resources if there is at least 1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold Building in that Settlement.

values.name: Tirakuna
values.description: +15%[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food in Settlements with their City Center adjacent to a Mountain or with 3 worked Mountain tiles.

values.name: Tongiaki
values.description: +10 [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Naval Trade Route Range.

values.name: Tool Making
values.description: +1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on the Palace.

values.name: Trade Winds
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold and [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness for every imported [icon:RADIAL_RESOURCES] Resource.

values.name: Trenchworks
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortified Units and [icon:CITY_FORTIFIED] Districts.

values.name: Tundikhel
values.description: +3 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for all Units adjacent to [icon:CITY_UNIMPROVED] Mountains. This is doubled if the Unit is also in your territory.

values.name: Tzolk'in
values.description: +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Buildings.

values.name: Uposatha
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Buildings.

values.name: Varna
values.description: +1 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold from [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists.

values.name: Vassalage
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every [icon:CITYSTATE] City-State you are Suzerain of.

values.name: Wakia
values.description: +3 [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold for every active [icon:TRADE_ROUTE] Trade Route.

values.name: Waqāye'-e Ettefāqiya
values.description: +10 [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science and [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in the [icon:NOTIFICATION_SELECT_CAPITAL] Capital for every Settlement under the [icon:SETTLEMENT_LIMIT] Settlement Limit.

values.name: Welfare State
values.description: [icon:YIELD_TOWNS] Towns gain [icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness equal to your [icon:ATTRIBUTE_POLITICAL] Diplomatic Attribute. -5 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Westernization
values.description: +15% [icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science but -15% [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.

values.name: Xenia
values.description: +50% [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards initiating and progressing the [icon:PROJECT] Befriend Independent Project.

values.name: Yeomanry
